title: Ep. 419: Why Brexit Could Crush the Markets
itunes:title: Why Brexit Could Crush the Markets
description: John Petrides, Managing Director and Portfolio Manager at Point View Wealth Management, talks Brexit and why the U.K. leaving the European Union could have a huge impact on your portfolio.   John then gives his predictions on where oil prices are heading and how many rate hikes he expects from the Federal Reserve this year.  He also shares his favorite stock to buy right now.
